channel.title: Vscode on Oyyko
channel.description: Recent content in Vscode on Oyyko

item.title: Vscode 返回上一个位置快捷键
item.description: 非常有用的一个功能。 Windows: $Alt + \leftarrow$ Linux: $Control + Alt + -$

item.title: Using Cpp17 or higher version of Cpp on Vscode extension Clangd
item.description: Recently I’ve switched my code completion tool in VScode from Microsoft’s official plugin to clangd. On the one hand, clangd can provide a better user experience, on the other hand, I also use this plugin in my company (Bytedance). I joked to myself: Two of the most interesting things I learned when I interned at the company were that indentation changed from four spaces to two, and braces changed from wrap to no wrap.

item.title: VsCode Latex 插件配置
item.description: 更改vscode的 setting.json文件 加入 1"latex-workshop.latex.tools": [ 2 { 3 "name": "latexmk", 4 "command": "latexmk", 5 "args": [ 6 "-synctex=1", 7 "-interaction=nonstopmode", 8 "-file-line-error", 9 "-pdf", 10 "-outdir=%OUTDIR%", 11 "%DOC%", 12 "-xelatex" 13 ], 14 "env": {} 15 }, 即可 即在命令参数的最后增加 -xelatex 参数 备注：之前在文件头部添加% !TEX program = xelatex是管用的，现在不知道为啥又不行了。
